definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: Japan's Transport Ministry said the helicopter belongs to the Japanese Toho airlines.
sentences.chinese: 日本國土交通省稱該直升機屬於日本東邦航空公司。
